metadata.title: CVE-2023-43804 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: urllib3 is a user-friendly HTTP client library for Python. urllib3 doesn'ttreat the `Cookie` HTTP header special or provide any helpers for managingcookies over HTTP, that is the responsibility of the user. However, it ispossible for a user to specify a `Cookie` header and unknowingly leakinformation via HTTP redirects to a different origin if that user doesn'tdisable redirects explicitly. This issue has been patched in urllib3version 1.26.17 or 2.0.5.

criterions.comment: python-urllib3 package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
python-pip package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
